雪華 750円
※点数未掲載
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
二日前にオープンの新店。動物系の清湯に仄かな海産物出汁、これに香味油を組み合わせた一杯。細ストレート麺はシルキーで、このスープにはしっかりマッチ。旨味が強く、飲んで帰る前の一杯に最適。ご馳走様でした。
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Yukinomatayuki＠Mita Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Newly opened the day before yesterday. The soup is made from pork, chicken, slightly dried seafood broth and flavored oil. Very thin noodles are silky, and hit with a drizzle of flavored oil. Anyway, it has a lot of Umami, so nice ramen after drinking. That was really delicious. Thank you.

pork broth, chicken broth, dried seafoods broth, whole wheat flour, pork, chicken, bamboo shoot, green vegetables, pepper, yuzu pepper, green onion

大島＠船堀 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ

★★★★☆ 3.60点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
最も通っている味噌の名店。店主はすみれ＠札幌の出身。白味噌、ラードから成る素晴らしい乳化、これに生姜とニンニクと合わせたスープの一体感がすごい。厚みがあり旨味があり、アフターまで隙はない。卵麺の質感、歯応えも丁度よく、江戸川に名品健在である。ご馳走様でした。
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️素材･組み合わせ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Oshima＠Funabori Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Miso chashu ￥1050
★★★★☆ 3.60pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
My best miso ramen shop in Tokyo. The owner received training at the famous ramen shop "Sumire＠Sapporo". Emulsified soup made from white miso and lard is a wonderful, garlics & gingers go well this soup. So amazing rich taste, it's perfect. The noodles made from flour & eggs are smooth texture, and have a nice bite. Anyway, enjoy this ramen this time too. That was really delicious. Thank you.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

white miso, lard, ginger, garlick, wheat, egg, pork, bean sprout, onion, green onion

▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
久しぶりに元くるり大塚さんのお店へ。ドロドロの辛味噌は相変わらずのコクとまろやかな辛さ。極太麺のリフトアップから跳ねる味噌ダレを抑え込みながら、今回も箸を休めることなく300gの麺を味噌ダレと一緒に完食。ご馳走様でした。

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣

★★★★☆ 3.59pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Went to Otsukaya（a a few years ago this is a famous ramen shop "Kururi"） for the first time in a while. This is a rich & thick spicy miso soup（It's sauce rather than soup）, same flavor as before.  While slurping very thick noodles, sometimes splatters miso sause, so it needs to eat softly. Easily finished 300g of noodles with miso sause this time too. I can't stop eating because it is so nice. That was really delicious. Thank you.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

★★★★☆ 3.61pt

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
This is an original ramen made from oyster broth with aijiromiso. It has a slightly koji flavor with sourness, and miso is deep. Oyster ajillo with miso and grated radish on seaweed is very interesting ingredients, after mixed well, the miso taste got better. That was really delicious. Thank you.

5.text:
八咫烏＠九段下 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ

【限定】鴨脂の和え玉 300円
★★★★☆ 3.59点

▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
退院後、徐々に日常のペースを取り戻し、久しぶりのラーメン。日本一醤油の漆黒に浮かぶ鴨脂。この分厚いコクを捌く、オレンジ、セリ、三つ葉、九条ネギ、そして葉ごぼうの相性の良さ。ここはあらゆる角度と深度、様々な素材の組み合わせが楽しめる、限定麺の最高峰。ご馳走様でした。
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️素材･組み合わせ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
鴨出汁、全粒粉、鴨肉、セリ、三つ葉、葉ゴボウ、九条ネギ、ブラッドオレンジ

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog

【Limited】Kamo ramen kuro ￥1300
【Limited】Kamoabura aedama ￥300
★★★★☆ 3.59pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
I ate ramen for the first time in a while. Because I had been hospitalized last week, and getting better now. Looks black shoyu soup with duck rich oil. The shoyu is aged special Nihonichi shoyu. The broth has a rich and a finer taste. Various kind of ingredients（orange, seri, mitsuba, young burdock, and kujo green onion ） go well this soup. This is a famous ramen shop for a lot of limited menu in Tokyo. Always feel new and deep ramen from this limited menu. That was really delicious. Thank you.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
duck broth, whole wheat flour, duck meat, seri, mitsuba, young burdock,  Kujo green onion, blood orange

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣

★★★★☆ 3.58点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
店主は名店七彩＠八丁堀の出身。煮干し出汁は芳醇で、柔らかな味わいの仕上がりだが、奥の方に絶妙な苦味が潜む。香り豊かな太平麺は、麺の噛み応え、もちつる感、共にパーフェクト。食紅のチャーシューだけ、七彩ではなく、かづ屋＠目黒を彷彿させる。ご馳走様でした。
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️素材･組み合わせ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Chukasoba Bakuman＠Fujimidai Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Chuka soba ￥750
★★★★☆ 3.58pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
The owner received training at the famous ramen shop "Shichisai＠Hacchobori". The niboshi soup is a finer taste, very smooth, and has a slightly balanced bitterness. Thick & flat noodles has a nice flavor of wheat, perfect bite, and very silky. Anyway only cha-siu-pork with red coloring reminds me of Kazuya＠Meguro. That was really delicious. Thank you.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Niboshi（dried baby sardines）, broth, flour, pork, bamboo shoot, onion, green onion

スタートアップが開発した、完全食のすご麺｢BASE PASTA｣を食べにゴールデン街の凪へ。一見蕎麦に似ているが、味わいはスープに隠れてしまい、ボソボソとした質感、そして期待より風味が弱い。一日に必要な栄養素の1/3が摂取出来る上に、カロリーは30%オフということで、気分的にはとても良いのですが、やはり小麦の麺が食べたくなります。選択肢が増えることはうれしいことなので、今後の改良に期待大です。ご馳走様でした。

Went to the famous ramen shop Nagi＠Shinjuku to eat the perfect noodles "BASE PASTA" that was made by Japanese start-up company. Looks like soba, but the flavor & the feel is not good than expected. It has 1/3 of nutrition a day, and what is better, low calorie food (30% off than wheat noodles). So, it's good for my health, but actually, want to eat wheat noodles. Cold weather in Meguro. Went to the best ramen shop, because craving something tanrei ramens. Soup has a soft & finer shoyu flavor, consists of a chicken oil layer and a special broth layer. In addition, the aftertaste is a rich & deep, so this ramen should be called the chronicle of Kanagawa tanrei style ramen. Anyway, went to here for the first time in 10 years, but it was the same wonderful ramen as before. The owner received training at a famous ramen shop "ZUNDBAR". This is still in good even today. That was really delicious. Thank you.

四日前。雪の予報と聞き、チャンスとばかりにラーメン部で訪れるも、行列はいつも通り😅今回は醤油をオーダー。スープは芳醇で柔らかな醤油の口当たり、これに鶏、乾物、蛤など、様々な出汁を組み合わせた至極の一杯。奥深い味わいの一体感は、都内でも屈指の仕上がり。ストーリーを持った味の移り変わりや、全粒粉の風味の良さまで、隙は無し。改めて名品健在である。ご馳走様でした。

4 days ago. Went to the famous ramen shop Hototogisu with ramen club members because I hear that the rain will turn to snow at night in Tokyo, so I think the shop is not crowded today. But as always there is a long line😅 Ordered the shoyu ramen this time. The soup has a mellow shoyu flavor, and special mixed broth made from chicken, dried some seafoods, and hard clams. The aftertaste has a very finer taste, this is one of the best ramen in Tokyo. I enjoyed the change of taste in the bowl, and the flavor of whole wheat flour is amazing. This is still in good even today. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Went to Suzuki for the first time in a year. Owner is the representative of Toranoko group. Previously, ordered shio ramen, so orderd shoyu this time. Soup made from dried seafoods & chicken broth is amazing. Has a nicely balanced flavor, and especially love aftertaste that continues for a long time in my mouth than shio ramen. Anyway, this is a great double soup I’ve ever had in my life. Slightly thin noodles made by Mikawaya seimen are chewy and tasty, perfectly matched with this shoyu. This is still in good even today. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Went to Futokoroya for the first time. The soup made from dried seafoods, pork, and chicken broth, has a robust shoyu flavor, in addition, a slightly spicy. I ate this before, but I can't remember the shop name. Afrer that,  now I remembered the shop name "Nakamuraya" because I saw the owner's Tenkuotoshi （ quick & unique draining the hot water off）. This is similar to the taste of Nakamuraya＠Ebina. Taste has changed a lot, but this shoyu flavor reminds me a little bit of the taste at that time of founding（Nakamuraya ＠Kozashibuya）. Newly opened in Ochanomizu two weeks ago. The shop is run by the company that produces the special green onions having a high sugar content（ 21.6 degrees ）. The soup has wonderful beef flavor. Some dried seafoods take away beef's unpleasant taste. When close my eyes, it's like a drink of hamburger patty's flavor. Anway, it's a very unique beef soup than expected. Straight noodles are thinner than Hakata tonkotsu ramen, and really supple. Green onions are fresh, mild, and enjoy a slightly sweetness every time I bite these. Well...awesome ramen. 二杯目はつけ麺。自販機の最も左上のボタンはその店の看板メニューであるが、ここに"つけ麺"の文字。醤油のつけダレは、キレのある酸味と凝縮感の強い鶏出汁と節の深みがある。鰹昆布水に浸された平麺の滑らかさは圧巻で、つけダレと合わせて食べると、出汁の調和に思わずため息。看板に偽りなし。この二杯を食べると、もはや新人賞というよりは、ミシュランにノミネートされる予感。ご馳走様でした。

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Second bowl is a dip noodle. The top left button of a ticket vending machine is the best recommended menu of a ramen shop, and this menu is "Tsukemen". Shoyu based dip sause has a sharp sourness in taste, and rich chicken & subtle dried some seafoods broth. Flat noodles in the kastuo & Konbu thick soup are really silky, and go well with dip sause. The combination of these is an amazing. Anyway, appearance & contents are in agreement. After had eaten 2 bowls, I think this shop will be nominated Michelin star rating rather than just getting a rookie of the year award. That was really delicious. Thank you.

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
明けましておめでとうございます。本年もどうぞ、宜しくお願いします。平成最後の麺初め、今日から食べ歩きスタート。一杯目は昨年末にオープンした荻窪の｢迂直｣へ。贈花が｢飯田商店｣と｢麦苗｣からという、前評判もさることながら、到着すると行列は既に20人超え。堅牢な醤油のカエシは味わい深く、クセのない鶏油と絡めると、店主が描く緻密な味の設計図が見えてくる。要の出汁は鶏、海産物、椎茸など、期待通りの複雑なアフターに舌鼓。スープと油膜にコーティングされた麺は、見事なシルキー感と風味のフレッシュさが光る。ご馳走様でした。二杯目に続く。

Ajitama Shoyu Ramen ￥880
Point is not listed now.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Happy new year. I look forward to sharing IG posts with you in 2019. This will be the last Menzome ( first ramen of the year ) of the Heisei Period. Start exploring ramen shops from today. As a first ramen in 2019, went to "Uchoku＠Ogikubo" that opened at the end of the last year. The shop was received some flowers as a celebration of newly opened from "Muginae" & "Iidashoten" that are the famous ramen shops in Japan. Although advance reviews, there was a long line when I arrived here. Robust shoyu is a very finer taste. And go well with a chicken oil. After savoring, I understood owner's original concept for this ramen. The soup made from chicken, dried seafoods, shiitake mushroom and so on. Aftertaste is really nice than have expected. Noodles coated with the soup & chicken oil are silky and make me feel of fresh flavor. That was really delicious. Thank you. Continue to second bowl.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

2018年食べ納め。柔らかな魚介出汁がカエシと絶妙な掛け合いを見せ、鶏や豚骨のベースがしっかり後味を支える、めくるめく淡麗醤油の極み。数ある名品達とも異なり、店主のアプローチに、遠く万願寺まで来たことを思わず忘れる。一杯ずつ丁寧に作る姿はもちろんだが、店主の笑顔、接客も素晴らしい。ご馳走様でした。インスタグラムを始めて一年、みなさまからたくさんのいいね、本当にありがとうございました。来年もどうぞ宜しくお願い致します(^_^)

Today is my last day of ramen this year. The soup made from dried some seafoods are very gentle flavor, and goes well with the robust soy sauce. In addition, aftertaste is based on tonkotsu & chicken broth, so this is the neo-classical shoyu ramen. This ramen is different from other great ramens. I was moved by the owner's new approach, so don’t care about a long distance. Anyway, the owner's smile & hospitality are really nice, not to mention polite operation. That was really delicious. It has been just one year since started Instagram, thank you for a lot of likes. I wish your happy new year(^_^)

Take the Tama monorail, went to newly opened shop at the end of last month in Hino city. Ramen freaks speak highly of this shop, so had been looking forward to today. The clear soup made from chicken and clams broth are very finer taste, better every time eat soup, in addition, aftertaste of bitter orange peel is a really nice flavor. So I think it will be a rookie of the next year candidate. Slightly thin noodles are silky, and have a nice texture, perfect bite, anyway this is amazing!! Continue to second bowl.

▶️感想・コメント

人間ドックが終わり、検査結果も数年ぶりに｢異常無し｣ということで、あまりの空腹とラーメンへの渇望を抑えきれず二郎系へ。豚骨醤油スープは、程よい濃度と後味のあっさり感が食べ易く、ヤサイ･アブラ増しが丁度良い。太麺は角が際立ち、プツリと切れる歯応えに箸が止まらない。店名からトリビアとして有名な、エースコックの｢ラーメン太郎｣のパロディで｢二郎｣の名が生まれたことを思い出しました。ご馳走様でした。

★★★★☆ 3.35pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
After annual medical checkup, went to Jiro type ramen, because really starving & craving for ramen, and the test results of medical checkup came back negative. Tonkotsu shoyu soup has well balanced flavor, aftertaste is really light than expected. Ordered an extra serving about vegetables and back fats, but the amount was just right because this is easy to eat. Thick noodles are firm and chewy, really nice, so can't stop to eat them. Ramen taro reminds me of the famous trivia about Jiro. The name "Jiro" was a parody of instant noodle "Ramen taro" made by the Acecook. That was really delicious. Thank you.

The owner received training at the famous ramen shop "Hisshoken". The soup changes depending on the day of the week, Sunday & Monday are rich tonkotsu & gyokai（dried seafoods broth）, Tuesday & Wednesday are mild gyokai, Thursday, Friday  and Saturday are rich tonkotsu & chicken soup. Today is rich tonkotsu & chicken. In addition, there are two types of noodles, can choose one. One is the freshly made noodles, the other is the aging noodles. Chose the aging ones. Went to the third brand ramen shop of "Katsumoto ramen chain". Newly opened yesterday. When arrived, there is a long queue（about 20 people） for the ramen. And today was so cold, but stood the cold an hour outside. Looks tanrei shoyu ramen（classical shoyu ramen with chicken oil）, but this soup doesn't use shoyu. In addition, the soup is unflavored, made from only ingredients. So this bowl has a true value of msg. The soup based on duck & chicken broth, and covered with a refined chicken oil. The taste is really finer and aftertaste has a mild flavor. Anyway, the famous Japanese traditional spot "Kabukiza in Ginza" is near here, so all people will enjoy this wonderful ramen. That was really delicious. Thank you.

So this is neo classical shoyu ramen. Thin straight noodles are silky, good comfortable slurping. Onions are good work as a Hashi-yasume ( different-kinds-of tasteful enjoyable ingredients). Really nice combinations. That was really delicious. Thank you.

名店"もりの中華そば"の跡地。今回も店主は東京の最高峰多賀野出身。幼児がいれば笑顔で "味を薄くできます！"、白シャツの人がいれば "紙エプロンはご利用されますか？"という、お客を観察しながら、気持ちのいい接客に心が弾む。伝家の宝刀"追い煮干し"は健在で、力強い醤油ダレに負けない出汁の豊かさは随一。が、これ以上に特筆なのが麺。スープの中で、しなやかさとコシの二律双生が見事に描かれており、踊れる麺と表しても良いだろう。笑って歩くという店名に相応しく、夫婦の笑顔、優しさ溢れる接客、そして極まる味に舌鼓。ラーメンは"鶏ガラ、豚ガラ、人ガラ"という名言があるが、まさしくこれ。多賀野伝説はさらに受け継がれていく。ご馳走様でした。
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog

Chukasoba ￥730
★★★★☆ 3.58pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Opened at the site of a famous ramen shop "Mirinochukasoba". The owner received training at the top grades ramen shop "Takano" in Tokyo this time too. When small kids are here, the owner says "Please let me know, if you need to dilute the taste for kids", and people in the white shirts are here, "Would you like to use a paper epron for protecting your cloth ?" and things like that, these customer services makes me feel happy, because the owner always observes customer. The robust shoyu soup made from double niboshi broth (called Oiniboshi in Japan) are excellent. But it's striking that noodles have silky & chewy, and boost each other up, anyway wonderful. It would be good to represent "dancing noodles" in the soup. Shop name Efu means "walk through life with a smile, just like the name, it has the owner & his wife's smiles, great customer service, and wonderful taste. It is said ramen consists of Torigara (chicken broth), Butagara (pork broth), and Hitogara (character of a person), this is it. The legend of "Tagano" ramen culture continues.That was  really delicious. Thank you.

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
練馬の住宅街の一角から、素晴らしい出汁の香りが漂う。店主は渡なべ＠高田馬場の出身。出汁は魚節系と動物系出汁の王道ダブルスープだが、雑味が少なく、洗練された旨味、そして厚みを感じる。中細のストレート麺はプツッと切れる歯切れの良さと、スープの吸い上げがお見事。大きめのチャーシューも食べ応えは十分。厚みのあるメンマを食べながら、渡辺樹庵イズムを垣間見ることのできる、貴重な一杯。ご馳走様でした。

★★★★☆ 3.67pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Had a good smell of dried some seafoods broth from residential area in Nerima. The owner received training at a famous shop "Watanabe＠Takadanobaba". The soup made from dried seafoods, pork borns, and chicken broth is called "double soup" in Japan. It's are very popular soup but this is refined than ever before. It has rich & robust taste. Slightly thin noodles are great bite, and go well with the soup. Big char-siu pork is filling too. Thick bamboo shoots remind me Mr.Watanabe style ramen.(He is a famous ramen producer in Japan). That was really delicious. Thank you.

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
初めて進化の駅前支店へ。本店依頼約10年ぶりの再訪ということで、期待が高まる一時。今回は未食だった鯵煮干をオーダー。一口目から香り、エグミを抑えた上品な鯵煮干が広がり、塩の甘味と圧巻のアフター。言葉にならず、改めて名品健在である。全粒粉の細ストレート麺は舌触りも良く、歯応えも素晴らしいもの。山葵を溶かすと、様々な味わいに変化しつつ、後味はぐっと引き締まる。期待を越えて、"進化"という看板に偽りなし。ご馳走様でした。

今日から大つけ麺博がスタート。予選106店舗から36店舗が決勝戦へ。第一陣一杯目は宮城の代表"だし廊＠仙台"。濃厚な貝だしと魚醤という、旨みもアフターも非常に長い淡麗醤油の理想系。硬めに茹でられた中細ストレート麺は、コシも残しつつシルキーな喉越し。貝ペーストを途中で溶かすと、トリュフ香が全体に広がり、スープとの一体感はイベントとは思えない素晴らしい完成度。ご馳走様でした。

Dip noodle festival starts from today. This is going to be held 4 weeks. 36 shops got passed the preliminary rounds. ( from 106 shops) Went to "Dashiro＠Sendai" as a first bowl in the first week. Rich clams broth with fish sauce has wonderful flavor and aftertaste is very long. This is an ideal shoyu ramen. Slightly thin noodles are firm bite & silky. Mixed clam paste into soup, truffle's flavor is full. Anyway it was really nice ramen than I expected. That was really delicious. Thank you.

約10年ぶりの玉。節系の濃厚魚介豚骨というと、すっかり一般的になっているが、玉の魅力は超が付く濃厚ダレと極太平麺の絡み、この一体感にある。食べ終わると、丁度つけダレがなくなるほどの絶妙な濃度、極太平麺の面積、この辺りにつけ麺王者の真骨頂を垣間見ることができる。改めて名品健在。ご馳走様でした。

Especially Gyoku's one is really rich & thick. Noodles are very thick and flat. They go very well with sause. When have finished to eat, there was no more dip sauce left in the bowl. Anyway, the great ramen is still in good even today.That was really delicious. Thank you.

昨年12月オープン。店主は天才シェフ坂井さん率いる名店斑鳩の出身。鶏と魚介出汁のスープは、旨み、甘さ、塩加減のバランスが完璧で、余韻まで非の打ち所がない。麺はそれ以上に衝撃で、水分を多く含ませたもちつる感抜群の極太麺。噛み応えと小麦の風味は素晴らしく、低加水麺が主流という流れの中で、圧巻の創作、そして傑作である。屋号は店主の娘さんの名前"ののか"と店主の名前"くらと"から命名とのこと。味わいからオペレーション、接客まで、とにかく全てがすごい。ご馳走様でした。

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Opened last December. The owner received training at the famous ramen shop "Ikaruga". (Ikaruga's owner is an expert chef in Japan. His ramen shop is in Tokyo station) The soup made from chicken & dried seafoods broth is very rich, and it has a nicely balanced flavor. There are umami, sweetness, and saltiness, both are good work for the perfect ramen. In addition, very thick noodles are amazing too. This original noodles contain a little more water, so very mochimochi bite and silky. There are a lot of ramen shops that use the noodles contain a little water on the ramen scene. I was deeply impressed by this challenge. Nonokura is named after owner's daughter name "Nonoka" and owner's name "Kurato". Anyway, taste, operation, polite service for the customers are wonderful. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Second bowl is a Hakata tonkotsu ramen. Already Takana & red pickled ginger are included in the soup, so I have mixed feelings, because they are stong flavors, usually served in a separate dish in Japan. Soup is pretty good, but this is tonkotsu ramen. Ramen shop is a fast food restaurant in Japan, but there are a lot of side dishes & various liquor in this shop, so think that it's important to enjoy a leisurely meal overseas. While on a journey, I ate many pancakes and more, so had a lovely time. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：pork bones broth, wheat, pork, seasoned boiled egg, leaf mustard(takana), red pickled ginger, Jew’s ear mushroom, green onions

二杯目にラーメン。いつも味の薄い方から食べるのですが、どうしてもつけ麺から食べたかったので、久しぶりに逆。シンプルでライトな魚介出汁は、食べ易く、昨今のギミック多し一杯に向けたアンチテーゼ的な味わい。これは老若男女、違和感なく食べられるラーメン。ご馳走様でした。

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog

Ramen ￥750
★★★★☆ 3.56pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Second bowl is a ramen. Always eat ramen first. But today, wanted to eat tsukemen first, because this is "Rokurinsha". The soup is a classic shoyu ramen with dried seafoods broth. It's easy to eat for men and women of all ages. Some famous ramen owners have strong presence for making special ramens thesedays. But this is very simple, makes me feel of an antithesis of theirs. Anyway that was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：pork bones & some dried seafoods broth, wheat, pork, bamboo shoots, seaweed, fish cake, green onions

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
出国ゲート前の六厘舎へ。さすがにここは行列無しと穴場的だが、日本出発前に食べられるのはとてもうれしい。豚骨魚介のつけダレは、とみ田の節々感に比べクリーミーだが、2006年に初めて食べた感動を今も覚えている。頑者と共に濃厚つけ麺の市民権取得に、大きく貢献したのは間違いなく、ビジネスとして拡大を続ける三田店主の手腕に今後も注目したい。二杯目に続く。

素材：豚骨魚介、小麦、豚肉、メンマ、海苔、ナルト、葱

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Tsukemen ￥800
★★★★☆ 3.56点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Went to "Rokurinsha" in front of departure gate. This is very special spot, so it's not necessary to get line in. Anyway, I'm happy to eat soon. The dip sauce made from pork bones broth & dried some seafoods one are nice, it's creamier than a famous shop "Tomita". This flavor always reminds me of a debut of "Rokurinsha" in 2006. I'm sure that this shop make a large contribution to expand "rich & dried some seafoods flavored tsukemen" with "Ganja". Hope that Rokurinsha owner Mr.Mita's ability as a business person will go well. Continue to second bowl.

Ingredients：pork bones & some dried seafoods broth, wheat, pork, bamboo shoots, seaweed, fish cake, green onions

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
二杯目は塩つけ麺。しっかりと水で締めた全粒粉の麺は、素晴らしい小麦の凝縮感。つけダレは酸味、コクのバランスが良く、後味もすっきり。つけダレに合わせると、鶏油との絡み、風味が際立ち、ラーメンとは異なる味のマトリックスを感じる。さすがにすぎ本、名品健在である。ご馳走さまでした。

素材：鶏出汁、鶏油、乾物出汁、小麦、豚肉、鶏肉、ワンタン、唐辛子、フライドオニオン、葱

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Ramen Sugimoto＠Saginomiya Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Shio tsukemen ￥800
★★★★☆ 3.80点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Second bowl is shio tuskemen (dip noodle). Noodles are washed to remove the sliminess and then tightened in water, and are full of flavors of whole wheat flour. The dip sauce has rich & sour taste, in addition, aftertaste is refreshing. Noodles Into tasty soup, flavored chicken oil coated noodles, ummm, what a wonderful mariage! The matrix of flavors is different from ramen. Anyway, this is "Sugimoto", the great ramen is still in good even today. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：chicken broth, chicken oil, dried some seafoods broth, wheat, pork, chicken, wontons, fried onions, red peppers, green onions

久しぶりのすぎ本。店主は今は亡き、天才佐野実氏の弟子。前回は塩だったので、今回は醤油をオーダー。鶏油の下の黒醤油は、鶏や乾物など様々な出汁が合わさり、一口目からグッと惹き付けられる凝縮された旨み、これが最後まで続く。自家製の細ストレート麺はシルキーで、"滑らかに啜る"楽しさが存分にある。二杯目に続く。

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
It's been a while since I last came here. Owner is the disciple of the late Mr.Sano who is the Japanese ramen expert. Ordered shio ramen last time, so this time orderd shoyu one. The black soup under the chicken oil is wonderful finer taste, have a various broth, anyway, very nice all the time. Homemade thin noodles are super silky, so enjoy slurping it. Continue to second bowl.

Ingredients：chicken broth, chicken oil, dried some seafoods broth, wheat, pork, chicken, wontons, bamboo shoots, seasoned boiled egg, green onions

らぁ麺 鳳仙花＠西新宿 東京都
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
つけ麺 850円
★★★★☆ 3.58点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
二杯目はつけ麺。つけダレは、塩エッジの効いた金目鯛の出汁。中細の平麺は、そのままでも美味しく、風味の心地よさに箸が止まらず。つけダレに浸して食べると、想像以上の味の広がりに舌鼓、めくるめく世界である。鮮魚系ラーメンも増えて、東の"麺魚"、西の"いつ樹"、そして中心の"鳳仙花"と呼ばれるよう、新宿の代表店に成長して欲しい。ご馳走様でした。

素材：金目鯛出汁、全粒粉、豚肉、メンマ、金目鯛、紫玉葱、葱

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Ramen Housenka＠NishiShinjuku Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Tsukemen ￥850
★★★★☆ 3.58点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Second bowl is dipping noodle. Dipping sauce is a salty but having enough umami of alfonsino broth. Slightly thin & flat noodles are very nice in itself without dipping sauce. There is a good flavor of flour, so I can't stop to eat. The combination of sauce & noodles were perfect match than expected. Ramen shops of snapper broth's are gradually increasing. "Itsuki" in the west of Tokyo, "Mengyo" in the east of Tokyo, both are very famous ramen shops of their ramen. I expect that "Hosenka" become a famous ramen shop with them. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：alfonsino(red snapper) broth, whole wheat flour, pork, bamboo shoots, grilled alfonsino, purple onions, green onions

らぁ麺 鳳仙花＠西新宿 東京都
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
特製らぁ麺 1000円
★★★★☆ 3.58点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
オープン直後は連日売り切れで、三度目の来訪。はやし田に続く、鈴蘭系列のサードブランド。スープは巷の噂に違わぬ金目鯛の出汁。鯛とは違う強さと旨み、アフターが非常に長い。全粒粉の中細縮れ麺は、風味、質感共に素晴らしく、スープとの相性はお見事。盛り付けは名店"麺魚"を彷彿させますが、そのオリジナリティに、資本系ラーメンの緻密に計算された本気を、目の当たりにした感じです。余韻に浸ったまま、二杯目へ。

素材：金目鯛出汁、全粒粉、豚肉、メンマ、金目鯛、味玉、紫玉葱、葱

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Ramen Housenka＠NishiShinjuku Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Tokusei Ramen ￥1000
★★★★☆ 3.58点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Went to here twice after opening, but I wasn't able to eat ramen because ramens were sold out. And finally, I got to eat. This shop of "Suzuran ramen group" is 3rd brand, "Hayashida" is followed by this. The soup of alfonsino broth has a big wonderful flavor, so the rumor of people proved to be true. Especially it is good to have a different taste from a broth of red snapper. Noodles of whole wheat flour have good firm bite, flavors, and good match with soup. Food preparation looks like a famous ramen shop "Mengyo", but this ramen has full of originality. Anyway, I felt the power of a big ramen chain from this meticulous ramen. Continue to second bowl while enjoy aftertastes.

Ingredients：alfonsino(red snapper) broth, whole wheat flour, pork, bamboo shoots, grilled alfonsino, seasoned boiled egg, purple onions, green onions

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ

★★★★☆ 3.57点

▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
カレーと蔵書、スポーツ用品の町というイメージが強い神保町だが、最近はラーメンの激戦区である。濃厚な甲殻出汁に動物系のダブルスープは、下処理が完璧でコクの溢れるスープ。太平麺は味が乗り易く、小麦の凝縮感も高い。〆のリゾットまで、流れるようなオマール海老のストーリー。ご馳走様でした。

素材：鶏出汁、オマール海老の甲殻出汁、小麦、豚肉、紫玉葱、紫キャベツ、味玉、サワークリーム、バゲット、みずな

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Ebimaru ramen＠Jinbocho Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣

★★★★☆ 3.57点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Jibocho town used to be famous for curry shops, many old book shops, and various sports equipment shops, but recently become ramens hotspot. Soup made from rich omar shrimp broth & chicken broth is very good, especially preparation of omar shrimps is the perfect operation. Thick & flat noodles go well with the soup, in addition, having a condensed wheat flavor. Makes me feel that there is the chef's story of omar shrimps until finish off the meal with rissot.That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：chicken broth, omar shrimp broth, wheat, pork, purple onions, purple cabbage, seasoned boiled egg, sour cream, baguette, Japanese mustard green

名物店主の川原氏率いる、伝説の豚骨店が三日前に高円寺に復活。行列は約30人。キャッチフレーズは"今度はしくじらない！"。スープは変わらず濃厚な東京豚骨。これに茹で卵、海苔、ネギ、チャーシューが山盛りの一杯。あのプリント海苔もそのまま。極細麺の歯応え、スープとの相性は良い。店舗の外装、スタッフ数、オーダーのダイナミックさを見ると、確かにあの人が帰ってきた感がある。創業は1987年。新たな伝説をまた作って欲しい。ご馳走様でした。

素材：豚骨出汁、小麦、豚肉、キクラゲ、茹で卵、海苔、葱

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Legendary tonkotsu ramen shop lead by unique owner Mr.kawahara restarted in Koenji 3days ago. Approximately 30 people were lined up in front of the shop when I just arrived. Catchphrase is "I never fail".
The soup is rich tonkotsu, I'm sure it's the same as before. This Ramen has a lot of toppings (boiled eggs, seaweeds, green onions, char-siu porks). Character on the seaweed is the same as before too. Noodles are firm byte, go well with soup. Exterior of the shop, a lot of staffs, dynamism of operation, makes me feel the return of him. Established in 1987. A new legend of "Nandenkanden" begins.That was really delicious. Thank you.

Second bowl. Having an original flavor of niboshi broth(dried sardines broth) in the bitterness soup, salt concentration is high,  and so fascinated by niboshi color like concrete blocks. When eat soup with onions, it will be the best ramen for niboshi lover. Firm noodles are perfect bite, and enjoy the flavor of wheat & good crispiness all at the same time. I ate a ballottine for the first time, so felt that this is the important dish as an ex-French chef. The highest ramens of Chiba prefecture are here. That was really delicious.

Niboshi soup tasting training will be end soon in this Summer. At last, visited a famous ramen shop "Suji". The owner received training at the famous ramen shops "Ibuki" & "Chibakara", in addition, he was a French chef. Niboshi soup is not only a strong bitterness but also a very finer taste. When I close my eyes, I can feel the Ibuki's niboshi flavor. Some toppings are also excellent, so I am fascinated by owner's cooking methods. Anyway, what a nice ramen. Continue to the second bowl.

藤沢SSTからの帰り道。フリーバーズが定休日だったため、移転後初の"森や"へ。変わらない無化調出汁は五臓六腑の奥深く、滋味深く、染み渡る。中太の縮れ麺は圧巻の旨さで、風味も食感も完璧。輸出に頼る外麦が80%を占める製粉業界において、はるゆたかは0.2%未満と幻と言われる所以だが、その味わいには偽りなし。本郷台に名品健在である。二杯目に続く。

素材：魚介出汁、鶏出汁、小麦、豚肉、味玉、メンマ、マッシュルーム、海苔、葱

On my way home from SST＠Fujisawa. Visited a famous ramen shop "Moriya" after moved into a new shop, because the shop "free bird" that have been wanted to go to is a regular holiday. Just as before, no msg soup is wonderful. Ahh...feel this soup seep into the heart's core. Thick wrinkled noodles are perfect about a feel, bite, and aftertaste.  80% of Noodles depend on imported wheat from other countries, but this special wheat "Haruyutaka" is only distributed 0.2% of on the flour(-milling) industry. So, it's a valuable one, and there is no doubt about quality. Anyway, the great ramen is still in good even today. Continue to second bowl.

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
新感覚の麺を求めて下北沢の"麺と未来"へ。ワンオペで約10人のカウンター席と、切り盛りは大変そうだが、既に人気店の貫禄。魚介、海産物、鶏出汁を丁寧に合わせたスープは味わい深く、無化調ながら物足りなさは皆無。手打ち極太麺は、ほうとうのように口の中でするっと溶ける場合もあれば、"Tetsu"の強麺のような力強いコシが残っている物もあり...つまり、太さ･茹で状態の不均一さが過去に例を見ず、結果として "口に運ぶ毎に違う食感を楽しめる" という前衛的な試みが光る。類似、模倣が加速する業界の中で、店主のこのオリジナリティ溢れる取り組みは本当に尊敬に値する。ご馳走様でした。

素材：魚介出汁、鶏出汁、小麦、ワンタン、豚肉、味玉、メンマ、三つ葉、葱

★★★★☆ 3.60pt

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Went to the new ramen shop "Mentomirai＠Shimokitazawa" to find a new style ramen. Looks very busy because this shop is managed by one owner in spite of many seats, but already seems like a famous shop. Shio ramen soup made from dried some seafoods & chicken bones broth is very finer taste. Not to mention "No msg", have enough rich flavors. Very thick noodles are brimming with originally, sometimes like a Houtou ( very thick flat noodles in Yamanashi ), and sometimes like a very firm noodles of a famous ramen shop "Tetsu". I'm sure these are unprecedented noodles about the quality of being uneven and lacking uniformity, but it's very fun every time a bite. There are a lot of imitation ramens on the ramen scene, so this owner's challenge is worthy of reverence. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：chicken bones broth, dried some seafoods broth, wheat, wonton, pork, seasoned boiled egg, bamboo shoots, Japanese honewort, green onions

ワークショップの前に久しぶりに来店。オープンの2003年から毎年一、二回訪れているが、今年でなんと15周年というから驚き。都内でも屈指のダブルスープ(動物系と魚介系の合わせ出汁)だが、今も全くブレず無化調、1メニュー提供、昼営業のみである。林さんに相変わらず笑顔はないが、愚直な仕事はさすが、名品健在である。お昼に渋谷に来ると、寄っちゃいますね(^^; ご馳走様でした。

★★★★☆ 3.61pt

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Went to the famous ramen shop "Hayashi＠Shibuya" before my workshop. Have been visiting here once every year since 2003. It's surprising that this year is 15's anniversary. This finer soup made from 2 broths (pork bones & chicken bones broth, dried some seafoods broth) is one of the best in Tokyo. It's still no msg now, it's only one ramen on the menu, and only open during daytime. The owner chef "Hayashi" does not have a smile, but his work is always excellent, the great ramen is still in good even today. After all, I go here when I visit Shibuya in the daytime.  That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：pork bones broth, chicken bones broth, dried some seafoods broth, wheat, pork, seasoned boiled egg, bamboo shoots, green onions, citron

横浜の名店。昼営業のみなのに、前回間違えて夜に来てしまい再訪。灰褐色のスープは煮干し全開ながら、尖りのない奥深く上質な味わい。低加水の中細ストレート麺は、パツっと切れる歯切れが心地良く、スープとの相性も抜群。色合いから桜木町の名店"丿貫"の味を想定していたが、食べてみると、ラーメンが店主の数だけ味わいがあることを再認識。ご馳走様でした。

A famous ramen shop in Yokohama. Visited again because accidentally went to here at night before (even though only open in the daytime). Grey Brown soup has a heavy flavor of niboshi, but hardly feel bitterness, just wonderful one. Thin noodles that have a little moisture are perfect bite, gose well with the soup. I'm sure that the taste is similar to a famous ramen shop "Hechikan＠Sakuragicho" from the soup color, but realized that there are as many flavors as there are owners. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：dried sardines broth, chicken bones broth, wheat, pork, seasoned boiled egg, potherb mustard, onions, seaweed

★★★★☆ 3.60点

▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
二杯目はつけ麺。麺はロックンビリー嶋崎さん考案の昆布出汁に浸され、乾燥を防ぐスタイル。つけダレは、様々な出汁、鶏油、白醤油の甘味が光り、麺と合わせると複雑な旨味がすっきりとまとまっていく、完成度の高い一杯。群馬の県木である"クロマツ"が店の由来だと思われるが、県の代表として、今後もさらに輝きを放ってほしい。改めて高崎に名品健在である。ご馳走様でした。

素材：煮干出汁、海産物出汁、鶏油、小麦、豚肉、ワンタン、メンマ、味玉、カイワレ

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

★★★★☆ 3.60pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Second bowl is a tsukemen (dipping noodle). Noodles are in the kelp broth to prevent the drying of them. This is the famous ramen chef Shimazaki's style tsukemen. Dipping sauce made from various broth, refined chicken oil, and rich shoyu, goes well with noodles, makes me feel harmonized taste. Symbol tree of the Gunma prefecture is a black pine (called "kuromatsu" in Japanese), so I want this shop to become more famous like symbol one. Realized again, the great ramens are still in good in Takasaki even today. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：dried sardines broth, some dried seafoods broth, wheat, pork, wonton, bamboo shoots, seasoned boiled egg, radish sprouts

朝から子供達とお墓を掃除した後、久しぶりの"くろ松"へ。店主は目黒のかづ屋出身。行列は約30人。口当たりは繊細な和出汁に鶏油だが、神奈川淡麗系とは異なる醤油の芳醇さ。特筆すべきは中細平のストレート麺で、食感、スープの吸い上げ、アフターまで駆け抜ける心地よさが、もう十二分にある。7月に味をリニューアルしたということですが、北関東でも屈指のレベルに近づいたと感じました。二杯目に続く。

素材：煮干出汁、海産物出汁、鶏油、小麦、豚肉、メンマ、味玉、カイワレ

★★★★☆ 3.60pt

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Visited Kuromatsu＠Takasaki again after cleaning my family's grave with my children. This owner received training at a famous shop "Kazuya＠Meguro". Approximately 30 people were lined up in front of the shop. Soup is a finer taste of dried some seafoods broth with chicken oil. This is different from "Kanagawa Tanrei style ramen", anyway, the robust shoyu is nice. Thin flat noodles are good bite, soak up a lot of flavors, so really love it. I heard that it changes the flavor of ramen in July this year, but I'm sure this is becoming a leading ramen shop in north Kanto region. Continue to second bowl.

Ingredients：dried sardines broth, dried some seafoods broth, wheat, pork, bamboo  shoots, seasoned boiled egg, radish sprouts

ソラノイロ Factory & Labo＠浅草橋 東京都
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
ベジ郎(肉増し) 900円
★★★★☆ 3.55点

▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
夏バテの栄養補給に、ソラノイロの二郎インスパイア系列へ。店に入ると、私以外ほぼお客さんが女性。な、なんで？二郎系だよね！？と思いつつ、オーダー時のサイズをAで注文(3タイプから選択可能 A[麺200g 野菜200g] B[麺100g 野菜300g] C[麺300g 野菜100g] )

スープは尖りのない豚骨醤油で、二郎と比べると優しい味わい。野菜もたっぷりで、ホロ肉も格別。麺は中太のストレート麺で、ワシワシ極太という二郎のオーション麺に比べると、風味もコシもマイルド。

どこかテストキッチン的な印象もあったのですが、総じてソラノイロ色も感じました。しかし、さすがはコンサル宮崎さん。二郎系でターゲット拡大とは！脱帽です。ご馳走様でした。

素材：豚骨醤油、小麦、豚肉、背脂、モヤシ、キャベツ、ニンジン、ズッキーニ、ニンニク、カマボコ、キクラゲ。

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
I'm a little sick from the summer heat, so went to Jiro style ramen shop to get energy.(Jiro's ramen is a famous for special extra large serving one in Tokyo)  As soon as into the shop, surprised that most of the customers are women, because there are always only men in Jiro style ramen shop. Anyway, ordered size A (can select the size from A[noodles 200g vegetables 200g] B[noodles 100g vegetables 300g] C[noodles 300g vegetables 100g]) while thinking about the reason.

Soup made from tonkotsu with shoyu is milder than Jiro. There are a lot of vegetables, and soft char-siu pork is really good. Slightly thick straight noodles are good, but different from Jiro's them that it made from "Oshon" wheat are very thick and having a good chewy.

Had an impression that this is a test kitchen, but felt the quality of Soranoiro. Anyway, I was impressed by Mr.miyazaki's(Soranoiro owner) marketing skills, because got new customers by using Jiro style ramen. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：pork bones broth with shoyu, wheat, pork, back fat, bean sprouts, cabbages, carrots, zucchini, garlic, boiled fish paste, wood ear mushroom

It's called "Tanrei double soup". The taste is a very rich, but aftertaste is a gentle flavor of dried bonito. Thin noodles are perfect boiling time, and enjoy the flavor of wheat flour.  Needless to say about history of a famous ramen shop "zetton", anyway, that's the Michelin Bib Gourmand regular ramen shop. Continue to second ramen.

3月にオープンした葵グループの"中華そば 葵"、"竜葵"に続くサードブランド。鶏白湯のエスプーマはきめが細かく、具材を浮かせる盛り付けは目を引く。口当たりは、溶けかけのアイスのようだが、塩加減を抑えつつ、むしろ鶏出汁の風味は広がっていく。ストレート麺の歯切れも良く、吸い上げも上々。チャーシューは肉厚で食べ応えはあるが、もう少し薄切りにして、味のアクセントを作ってくれるとうれしい。泡を演出だけでなく、本来の特性をしっかり活かした一杯。ご馳走様でした。

素材：鶏白湯、小麦、豚肉、鶏肉、メンマ、葱、あられ

★★★★☆ 3.56pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Opened as a third brand ramen shop of Aoi ramen shop group this march.  Flagship shop is "Chukasoba Aoi", second one is "Hozuki" , both are famous ramen shops in Saitama. Foam on a chicken soup(called espuma in Spanish) is very fine, food presentation that looks like ingredients are floating on the foam is excellent. It's a smooth taste like a melting icecream, suppressing salt, but chicken rich flavor is given off. Noodles are nice, also coated with the soup well. Char-siu is filling but want more seasonings to adjust taste and thinly slice one. Not only the performance of foam, but also making use of one's special qualities. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：chicken bones broth、wheat、pork、chicken、bamboo  shoots、green onions、grilled bits of rice cake

先週オフィスの近くにオープンした新店。ここは豚骨ではなく、透き通る豚ガラの清湯。エッジの効いたスープは力強く、食べ進んで行く中で、具材と麺との相性の良さがジワジワと際立ってくる。博多の極細麺で食べる清湯というと、蘭鋳＠方南町が有名だが、赤坂でこのクオリティが食べられるのはうれしい。地価は高額で、飲食激戦区と条件はハードだが、長く続いて欲しい。ご馳走さまでした。

▶️Impressions・Comments

Newly opened near my office last week. Using pork bones to make broth, but this is not Tonkotsu ramen. This is called "Chintan" soup. (clear soup and nice & light) Strong flavor of broth is good, gradually come to like this while eating. That's not common to use Hakata's very thin noodles for Chintan soup, reminds me of the famous ramen shop "Ranchu＠Honancho", anyway, very happy to eat this high quality ramen at Akasaka. The value of land is very high and this area is food hotspot in Tokyo, I hope that continues for a long time. That was really delicious. Thank you.

恵比寿に三週間前にできた新店。本店は金沢。恵比寿と言えば阿夫利(AFURI)が有名ですが、こちらはABRI。鮮やかな向日葵が描かれた、九谷焼の高台丼に目を奪われながら、いざスープを飲んでみると、のどぐろ全開の濃厚で分厚い旨み、長いアフター、最後はすっきりと、めくるめく魚介出汁の極み。ウイスキーではないが、何も足さない、何も引かない、ただ極上のスープでした。ご馳走様。

素材：のどぐろ出汁、全粒粉、豚肉、白板昆布、メンマ、葱

★★★★☆ 3.59pt

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Newly opened in Ebisu three weeks ago. Flagship shop is in Kanazawa. When it comes to Ebisu, I can imagine a famous ramen shop "Afuri" but this is "Abri", so funny. Brightly colored sunflower of a porcelain bowl is very beautiful, really fascinated me. (This is Japanese traditional porcelain, called KUTANI ware, from Kanazawa)  The soup made from blackthroat seaperch 100％ broth is very tasty, having a rich flavor, great long aftertaste, and sharpness in taste. Not like whiskey, nothing to add, nothing to subtract, just best tasting. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：dried nodoguro (Blackthroat seaperch) broth、wheat、pork、thin white kelp、bamboo shoots、green onions

異業種ラーメン部で、七周年のマタドールへ。店主の岩立さんは、伝説のちゃぶ屋出身。牛骨出汁の芳醇な甘さ、奥深さは、鶏系や節系とはまた一線を画する。さながら後味には洋食の残り香がたゆたう。するりと風味を残す全粒粉の細麺もまた秀逸で、肉厚のチャーギューは、柔らかさ、味付け、肉々しさ、何れも変わらず、名品健在である。ご馳走様でした。

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Went to a famous ramen shop "Matador＠Kitasenju" with a ramen club team consist of different industries member.This month was the 7 years anniversary of shop. Owner Mr.Iwadate received training at Chabuya that is the legendary ramen shop in Tokyo but now it was gone. His beef bone ramens have robust broth, elegant and rich taste. These flavors are different from orthodox(chicken&dried seafoods broth) ramens. After eating, reminds me of a old restaurant that I was going to. Whole wheat flour noodles are very silky and having a good flavor too, in addition, thick beef cha siu is juicy, tender, and good seasoning. Anyway, these ramens are good as always. The great ramens are still in good even today. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：beef bones & potherbs & some dried fish broth、whole wheat flour、beef、glazed beef with soy sauce 、onion、green onions

王道ラーメンを求めて市ヶ谷へ。お店はあの"風来居＠秋葉原"のセカンドブランド。表面は熱々のラードに覆われ、スープは濃厚な魚節出汁、そして麺は中細ストレート。これぞ永福町大勝軒、これぞ中華そば、という遠い記憶が漂うノスタルジックな味わい。鶏油や低温調理のチャーシューを扱う店が多くなりましたが、このスタイルも東京のラーメン史。ご馳走さまでした。

素材：ラード&魚介出汁(鰹、鯖、煮干節)、小麦、チャーシュー、メンマ、葱

★★★★☆ 3.54pt

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Went to Ichigaya to find the classic ramen. This is second brand shop of "Furaikyo@Akihabara". The soup is covered with piping hot lard, made from various dried fish broth, and noodles are basic straight that. So just like the old and famous ramen shop "Taishoken@Eifukucho" in Tokyo, so this is "Chukasoba", makes me feel nostalgic. Ramen shops that deal chicken oil and low temperature  cooked char siu have increased on the ramen scene, but this classic one is the history of Tokyo's ramen. That was really delicious. Thank you.

Ingredients：lard & some dried fish broth、wheat、pork、bamboo shoots、green onions

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Third bowl. Ordered a limited summer soupless noodle "california cool fusion palette". Having a cold and mild refined sourness, rich squid ink and mayonnaise sause, various spices, and plentiful churrasco, so these ingredients and thick noodles are very good match. After eating 3 bowls, really feel the special and new style from ethnic and original mazesoba to classic shoyu ramen, and both of them are filled with a lot of meat. In addition, shop's atmosphere and customer service are good too. Someday would like to come here again. That was really delicious. Thank you !

Ingredients：squid ink & spice & garlic & mayonnaise sause、wheat、churrasco(beef)、sausage、tomato 、lettuces、onions、pineapple

Second bowl. Ordered a soupless ramen (called Mazesoba in Japanese), this is shop's true value. Salt based sause is really mild, and has variety ingredients (some spices, churrasco, vegetables, grilled pineapples for changing taste, and so on). These combinations are very good, makes me feel excited because better than pasta dishes. The super thick noodles are very "mochi mochi" (chewy) and perfect bite, so have I a room in my stomach, want to eat twice. This ramen shop lives up to its reputation, having good flavors from the beginning to the end. Continue to third one.

Ingredients：salt sause、wheat、churrasco (beef)、sausage、tomato 、lettuces、onions、spice chips 、pineapple

前回の臨時休業に挫けず、炎天下の中、再訪。今回はとてもハイレベルで、三杯行ってしまったのですが、何れも格別でした。まずは淡麗醤油から。繊細な鴨出汁や鶏油との組み合わせはもちろん、芳醇で複雑な味わいのブレンド醤油がすごい。中細のストレート麺も加水バランスはベスト、肉厚で火入れ完璧の鴨チャーシューも圧巻。混ぜそばメインの店とは思えない驚きの淡麗でした。二杯目に続く。

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Visited again under the blazing sun, because this shop was temporary closed last time. Finally ordered 3 bowls because the ramen and soupless noodles are extremely good. Firstly, the shoyu ramen.The broth made from duck meat and bones is finer taste, and chicken oil is good match. Especially the shoyu has a robust and complex flavors. Moisture balance of thin noodles is the  best, thick sliced char-siu of duck meat is very tender and juicy, anyway , this ramen is amazing. It's hard to believe because this is a famous shop of soupless noodle. Continue to second one.

Ingredients：duck meats and bones, potherbs, and dried seafoods broth、wheat、duck meats、seasoned boiled egg、mitsuba、green onions

ハルピンラーメン＠諏訪 長野県
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
ハルピンラーメン 650円
★★★★☆ 3.58点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
三連休は中央アルプスで高地順応後、初めて諏訪の名物ハルピンラーメンへ。二郎級に中毒性があるという話でしたが、食べて納得。寝かせダレ(ニンニク、昆布、玉葱、唐辛子等を4年間熟成させたもの)はジワジワと来る旨み、甘味、辛味が何度も繰り返されて、ハ、ハマる。総じて印象は野菜出汁＆香味の効いた辛味噌ラーメン。タレが重く、丼の底に沈むので、掬いながら絡めて食べて、という注意書きも面白い。二杯目に続く。

素材：香味ニンニク野菜のスープ、小麦、豚肉、もやし、メンマ、葱

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Harupin ramen＠Suwa Nagano
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Harupin ramen￥650
★★★★☆ 3.58pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Visited a famous ramen shop "Harupin ramen" in Suwa city for the first time, after enjoyed to climb the Japanese central alps during 3day weekend. Heard that eating it once,  become addicted like a famous ramen "Jiro", but I understood the reason after eating them. Ramen sauce made from 4 years aged garlic, kelp, onion, and red pepper has umami, sweetness, and pungent taste, these flavors are repeated to eat soup every time. That tastes similar to spicy moso ramen with vegetables. It was interesting how to eat this ramen, because the sauce is heavy and sink to the bottom, so everytime need to scoop it from the soup. Continue to second ramen.

Ingredients：garlic red pepper and some dried seafoods and vegetables soup、wheat、pork、bean sprouts、bamboo shoots 、green onions

100.text:
手もみ 中華そば 麦の花＠四谷三丁目 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
中華そば スペシャル 1080円
新店にて点数未掲載
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
一昨日プレオープンの新店。(正式オープンは7月14日)。まさかのスピードで名店"吟醸煮干 灯花紅猿"がリニューアル。鶏ガラに魚介、野菜の甘味と、エッジの効いた濃厚醤油が、最後の一口まで駆け抜ける一杯。太平麺は滑らかで、食感はもちもちとハイレベルな仕上がり。見た目のシンプルさよりも、食べ応えは十分。灯花の｢花｣は屋号に残りましたね。ご馳走様でした。

素材：鶏、魚介、野菜出汁、小麦、豚肉、味玉、ナルト、葱

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Temomichukasoba Muginohana＠Yotsuyasanchome Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Chukasoba special￥1080
The tabelog point is not listed now.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Preliminary opened the day before yesterday (Grand opening is July 14th). Unbelievable, reopened after renovating from the famous ramen shop "Ginjoniboshi Toukabenizal" that was just opened last year. The shoyu soup made from chicken, dried some seafoods, and vegetables broth is rich taste. Having a strong flavor from begining to the end. Super thick and flat noodles are not only silky, but perfect bite. This ramen looks classic style but it's filling. One character "花" of shop name was passed down from former shop to this shop. That was really delicious! Thank you.

Ingredients：chicken, dried some seafoods, and vegetables broth、wheat、pork、seasoned boiled egg、fish cakes、green onion

蕎麦いなり＠駒込 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ

しお蕎麦 780円
新店にて点数未掲載
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
二杯目。ラーメンのスープに日本蕎麦という、有りそうでない組み合わせ。清湯のスープは昆布や青菜の出汁を感じる独特の風味で、これは前店である"きなり"の塩スープそのもの。蕎麦は中華麺と比べると、やはりキレのある蕎麦つゆを求めてしまう。もう少しスープに合わせた蕎麦を開発できると面白い気がする、今後に期待したい。ご馳走様でした。

素材：昆布出汁、蕎麦、豚肉、鶏肉、チンゲン菜、筍、カイワレ、葱、生姜

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Soba Inari＠Komagome Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Shio Soba￥750
The tabelog point is not listed now.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Second bowl. Surprised that buckwheat noodles with ramen soup, so this is rare combination. The clear soup made from kelps and some green vegetables broth has a unique flavor, remember this taste before ate it at Kinari. Buckwheat noodles are not so bad compared to ramen noodles, but after all, want a standard "soba tsuyu"(shoyu dipping sauce). Hope that the original buckwheat noodles for this ramen soup will be developed. That was really delicious! Thank you.

Ingredients：dried kelp broth、buckwheat noodle、pork、chicken、bok choy、bamboo shoot、radish sprout、green onion、ginger

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

新店にて点数未掲載

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
大安吉日。昨日オープンした"蕎麦いなり＠駒込"へ。名店"きなり"の居抜き営業ですが、名前も似ているw。中華麺も蕎麦も扱う店ということで、出汁は昆布系。引いた甘さの醤油も柔らかく、無化学調味料で、味わいもきなりに近い。豚肉と鶏肉のチャーシューは絶品。細麺もしなやかで、和風出汁としっとりまとまっています。二杯目に続く。

素材：昆布･魚介出汁、小麦、豚肉、鶏肉、チンゲン菜、筍、味玉、海苔

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Soba Inari＠Komagome Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Shoyu soba + Ajitama ￥880
The tabelog point is not listed now.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Good day for everything. (called Taian in Rokuyo, the Japanese calendar) Newly opened at Komagome yesterday. The site where used to be the famous ramen shop "Kinari", the shop name is also similar to it. Providing both ramens and Japanese soba, the soup made from dried kelps broth. Mild shoyu is good, no msg, so similar to kinari's flavor too. Sliced pork, chicken are amazing. Silky thin noodles with this Japanese ingredients broth are harmonized well. Continue to second ramen.

Ingredients：dried kelp and seafoods broth、wheat、pork、chicken、bok choy、bamboo shoot、seasoned boiled egg、seaweed

ろく月＠浅草橋 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ

★★★★☆ 3.62点

▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
秋葉原で打ち合わせの後、久しぶりのろく月へ。都度変わる限定メニューが人気ですが、今日の限定は｢塩そば｣。さっぱりとした鶏と魚介出汁は、酸味･塩分共に夏の夜にピタリとはまり、これに近くの名店"くろ喜"の細麺が抜群に合う。店舗間の材料のやりとりは昔からありますが、組み合わせの広がりとしては面白いです。ご馳走様でした。

素材：鶏と魚介出汁、小麦、豚肉、鶏、牛蒡、メンマ、味玉、海苔、葱

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Rokutsuki＠Asakusabashi Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣

★★★★☆ 3.62pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
After a meeting, went to "Rokutsuki" for the first time in a while. Limited ramen is a popular in this shop, so ordered today's limited ramen "Shiosoba". The plain soup of chicken and dried seafoods broth has a good baranced sourness, salty, so it's just right on hot nights. Thin Noodles from the famous shop "Kuroki" near here are good match. It's a popular to exchange some ingredients with another shops. It's interesting the combination of these. That was really delicious!Thank you.

Ingredients：chicken and dried seafoods broth、wheat、pork、chicken、burdock、bamboo shoots、seasoned boiled egg、seaweed、green onion

連食。息子の煮干し修行用に二杯目を注文。エグミのない王道の煮干し出汁は、すっきりしつつも奥深く、絶妙な塩梅の塩ダレ。大判のチャーシューも柔らかく、食べ応えは十分。様々なラーメンを楽しめるのもこの店の魅力ですね。ご馳走様でした。

★★★★☆ 3.57pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Ate 2 ramens in a row. Ordered Niboshi (dried sardine) ramen as a second one for my son's niboshi tasting training. Classic niboshi ramen is no harsh after taste, having a very finer taste, and balanced salt sauce. The big chashu is a extremely soft. Anyway, good to enjoy various ramens in this shop. That was really delicious! Thank you.

Ingredients：dried sardines broth、wheat、pork、Japanese mustard spinach、fish cakes、seasoned boiled egg、green onion

新しいラーメンを求めて、ようやく来れたヌードルスタンド。店主達は、あの｢ミライゑ＠志茂｣のお洒落なおっちゃん達。味わい豊かな豆乳と味噌、ココナッツオイルをベースにしつつ、これにスダチ、生姜という奇想天外な組み合わせで、エスニックさから和食まで移り変わりを楽しめる一杯。ヴィーガンスタイルやローカーボ麺など、トレンドのキャッチアップも早い。二杯目に続く！

素材：ココナッツオイル、豆乳、味噌、小麦、鶏肉、小松菜、生姜、スダチ、紫カイワレ

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog

COCONUT Miso Ramen￥1100
★★★★☆ 3.57pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Looking for a new style ramen, finally visited here. Owners are cool oldmen from the famous shop "Miraie@Shimo".Soy milk and miso soup with coconut oil are very rich taste, in addition, sudachi(sharp citrus fruit) , ginger, these are fantastic combinations.Makes me feel from ethnic food to Japanese food.This is fast to catch up the new trend on the ramen scene because there are some ramens for vegan, also have low carb noodles.Continue to second ramen.

Ingredients：coconut oil、soy milk、miso、wheat、chicken、Japanese mustard spinach、ginger、sudachi、purple radish sprouts

中華そば 龍の眼＠末広町 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
中華そば 750円
新店につき、点数未掲載
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
MIST、鳴龍の斎藤店主プロデュースの新店。｢鳴龍｣は東照宮の鳴き龍からお客様との共鳴というコンセプトだったが、今回は｢龍の眼｣、画竜点睛の核心である。出汁は鶏清湯をベースに、昆布、海産物の旨みを凝縮したもので、後味の豊かさ、複雑さに、箸が止まらない。自家製麺のシルキーな細麺は、啜る毎に滑らかさが楽しめる。メニューからも伝わってきたが、この味は世界向け。味のコモディティ化が進むラーメン業界において、やはり別ベクトルの持ち主。さすがにワールドクラスの実力を感じました。ご馳走様でした。

素材：鶏出汁、昆布出汁、海産物出汁、小麦、チャーシュー、メンマ、葱

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Chukasoba Ryunome＠Suehirocho
 Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Chukasoba￥750
The tabelog point is not listed now.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Produced by Mr.Saito who is a famous ramen shop ( "Mist@Hong kong" "Nakiryu@Tokyo" ) owner in Japan.The concept of "Nakiryu(from Roaring Dragon ceiling at Nikko Toshogu Shrine)" is to have a good relationship with customers, like a resonance of tones in Roaring Dragon ceiling room.And this time, "Ryunome" is a Dragon's eye. So maybe just the finishing touches.In other words, the concept of this shop is very important.The broth made from chicken bones, dried kelps, and dried some seafoods has a good flavor, especially the aftertaste is great because it has complicated tastes.Original thin noodles are silky, so enjoy to slurp them every time.I felt this is a taste for not only Japanese but also foreigners because there are some good points for foreigners(some languages menu, not strong dried fish broth) .Recently increasing same tastes ramen shops on the ramen scene, so this shop has another attractions.Nonetheless, he is a world-class ramen master.That was really delicious! Thank you.

Ingredients：chicken, kelp, and dried seafoods broth、wheat、pork、bamboo shoots、green onion
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

麺屋 Hulu-lu＠池袋 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
久しぶりの池袋。店主は、今は無き伝説の名店"ちゃぶ屋"出身。ハワイアンな店内はファンシーで、とても明るい。鶏ガラメインのスープは優しい味わいで、塩の尖りもなく、じわじわと来る無化調の旨みが楽しめる。自家製の細麺も程よく噛み応えがあり、秀逸。やっぱりここに来るとスパムが食べたくなります。ご馳走様でした。

素材：鶏出汁、鶏油、小麦、チャーシュー、鶏そぼろ、柚、メンマ、カイワレ、糸唐辛子

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Menya Hulu-lu＠Ikebukuro Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

Shio Soba￥750
★★★★☆ 3.62pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
It’s been a while at Ikebukuro.The owner received training at Chabuya that is the legendary ramen shop in Tokyo but now it was gone.This is a fancy and Hawaiian style shop.Ramen is a subtle chicken taste, because of no msg, a little salt.But gradually understood this bowl's attraction. Original thin noodles are good bite.Anyway, always want to eat "Spam Musubi" (rice ball ) whenever come here.That was really delicious!Thank you.

Ingredients：chicken broth、chicken oil、wheat、pork、flavored ground chicken、citrus fruit、bamboo shoots、radish sprouts、shredded red pepper

竹末東京プレミアム＠押上 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ

醤油そば（味玉） 900円
鶏ホタテそば 900円
★★★★☆ 3.83点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
東京スカイツリーのお膝元。栃木の有名店"竹末食堂"の東京直営店。食材の香るオープンキッチンに、スタッフは訪日外国人との英語のやりとりが茶飯事という、ライブ感のある店内。鶏出汁と香味の醤油は味わい深く、食感の良い細麺を啜ると、アフターが心地よい。対して、鶏白湯はその濃厚さとホタテの潮の広がりが、口の中で楽しめる。燻製味玉や三種の部位のチャーシューなど、工夫は随所に散りばめられる。味もさることながら、接客、雰囲気も素晴らしい。また是非訪れたい。

素材：鶏と香味出汁（一杯目）、鶏白湯とホタテのペースト（二杯目）、小麦、豚肉、紫玉葱、燻製味玉、チンゲン菜、カイワレ、葱

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Takesue Tokyo Premium＠Oshiage Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Shoyu soba with Ajitama ￥900
Torihotate soba ￥900
★★★★☆ 3.83pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
This shop is close to Tokyo skytree, directly managed by the Takesue shokudou that is a famous ramen shop in Tochigi prefecture.There is a savory smell from open type kitchen, and shop staffs are always supporting foreign guests, so it has a good atmosphere.Shoyu soba made from chicken broth with some flavors is a very finer taste.It contains a good flavor after slurp the firm and thin noodles.The other one is a rich chicken soup, it has flavors of the sea from scallops paste, and well-balanced taste.In addition, the smoked seasoned egg, preparing three different parts of pork, puts a lot of thought into these menu.Anyway, of course the taste, good customer service, and have a great ambiance.I'd love to go again.

Ingredients：broth of chicken with some flavors(first bowl)、broth of chicken with scallops paste(second bowl) 、wheat、pork、purple onion、smoked seasoned egg、bok choy、radish sprouts、green onions

らぁめん 小池＠上北沢 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

★★★★☆ 3.76点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
店主は名店"くり山"出身。当初はつけ麺専門店でしたが、今ではラーメンの代表店に。一杯目は、耽美な盛り付けに、透き通る煮干出汁の極み。二杯目は、尖りのある煮干と鶏白湯の相性を楽しむ一杯。麺はどちらも低加水で、歯切れの良さが抜群。台湾混ぜそばも食べたかったのですが、お腹が限界。ご馳走様でした。

素材：煮干出汁（一杯目）、煮干＆鶏出汁（二杯目）、小麦、豚肉、鶏つくね、玉葱、味玉

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Ramen Koike＠Kamikitazawa Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Niboshi ramen with Ajitama ￥880
Noukou ramen with Ajitama ￥900
★★★★☆ 3.76pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
The owner received training at the famous shop ″Kuriyama＠Hakuraku″ in Kanagawa.At the beginning, this shop provided only dipping noodles, after that started to provide ramens.And now getting more and more popular in Tokyo.Clear soup ramen looks beautiful, having a good flavor, so there is an extreme broth of the niboshi（dried sardins）.The other one tastes rich and bitter, makes me feel better because the combination of niboshi and chicken broth is very interesting.Both thin noodles are good bite, releasing excess moisture of noodles makes it taste better.My plan was to order Taiwan mazesoba as a third one but I couldn't.Because I was so full.That was really delicious!Thank you.

Ingredients：broth of dried sardins（first bowl）、broth of dried sardins & chicken（second bowl） wheat、pork、chicken balls、onion、Japanese mustard spinach、seasoned boiled egg

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

※新店のため点数未掲載
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
二週間前にオープンした、ボンドオブハーツグループ、塚田さんのお店。着席すると、隣にミスターラーメンこと、せたが屋の前島さんの姿が...。つけダレは丸鶏をベースにしじみのエッジをしっかりと効かせた、キレのある淡麗。これに歯応え、風味、舌触りが完璧な平麺とピタリとマッチ。緻密さと味の表現の仕掛けが絶妙にうまい、素晴らしいつけ麺でした。また来ます。

素材：鶏としじみ出汁、小麦、牛肉、鴨肉、豚肉、しじみのムース、鶏油、トリュフ、トリュフオイル、玉葱、ライム

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Edomae Tsukemen Hakuei＠Higashiginza Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Tokusei Tsukemen ￥1200
The tabelog point is not listed now.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Newly opened in Ginza two weeks ago. This is a new ramen shop of "BOND OF HEARTS" group.It is the famous ramen chain by Mr.Tsukada who is a great ramen creater.After seating, surprised that the person sitting next to me is Mr.Maejima who is a most famous ramen chain "Setagaya" owner and called "Mr.ramen" in Japan.The dipping sauce broth that made from special chicken, a lot of clams tastes rich and a good feeling about finish.In addition, the flat noodles are silky, having a good flavor, and perfect bite, so go well with this sauce.The detailed cooking and expression method of this flavor are really good.Anyway, It's a wonderful Tsukemen（dipping sauce noodles）.Want to go again soon.

Ingredients：chicken & clams broth、wheat、beef、duck meat、pork、clams mousse、chicken oil、truffle、truffle oil、onion、lime

111.text:
ソラノイロ NIPPON＠東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
特製ベジソバ 1100円
★★★★☆ 3.58点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
東京駅22時20分、閉店ギリギリのラーメンストリートで、今夜はベジソバ一択。業界の旗手、宮崎さんのお店。麹町で初めて食べた時から改良が加わり、今やジャンルの一枠として、市民権を獲得。ポタージュのような野菜の旨味と、素材そのものの甘味がここにはある。前衛的で、チャレンジングな試みは、味以上の価値と枠を超える広がりを感じさせてくれる。名品健在である。

素材：野菜出汁、小麦（パプリカ練り込み）、人参、蓮根、キャベツ、トマト、ブロッコリー、味玉、バジル

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Soranoiro Nippon＠Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Ordered Menu・Tabelog
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Tokusei Vegesoba ￥1100
★★★★☆ 3.58pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Arrived at Tokyo station at 10:20pm.Went to ramen street right before the closing time.Tonight really wanted the vegesoba（vegetable ramens）.This shop is run by Mr.Miyazaki who is the leader on the Japanese ramen scene.The vegesoba has improved since its founding in Kojimachi, have gained a lot of popularity and is now largely accepted as one style of ramen.The soup of vegetables like a potage is really good, and the original taste of local ingredients is so nice too.Anyway, the challenge spirits of creating something new makes me feel the large value more than taste.The great ramen is still in good even today.

Ingredients：broth of some vegetables, wheat（blended with bell pepper）、carrot、lotus root、cabbage、tomato、broccoli、seasoned boiled egg、basil

112.text:
clab台風。＠人形町 東京
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️注文メニュー・食べログ
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
蟹そば＋雑炊セット 980円
新店のため点数未掲載
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
人形町に本日オープン。茗荷谷にあった、あの｢台風。｣が香港から約6年ぶりに凱旋出店。当時は魚介と豚骨のダブルスープでしたが、今回は豚骨と蟹。スープの輪郭に豚骨を残しつつ、横浜の丿貫（へちかん）のような濃厚な蟹出汁、これにコシのある中細麺が絶妙に絡む。海外に挑戦したラーメン屋が再び日本に帰ってくる時代、時間の流れを感じます...。ご馳走様でした。

素材：豚骨＆蟹出汁、小麦、豚肉、メンマ、鶉の燻製味玉、玉葱、ガーリックほうれん草ペースト

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー
Clabtaifu.＠Ningyocho Tokyo
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Newly opened in Ningyocho today.In those days this shop was in Myogadani, after that challenged to open the ramen shop overseas, and now returned to Japan from Hong kong for the first time in 6 years.It has a double soup ramen（tonkotsu＆dried seafoods） before, but this is different, the soup made from tonkotsu＆clabs.Based on tonkotsu, have a rich clab flavor like the famous ramen shop ″Hechikan″ in Yokohama, and excellent with thin straight noodles.The event that a ramen shop come back to Japan from challenging overseas reminds me of those days...Anyway, That was really delicious!Thank you.

前回の臨時休業に挫けず、再訪。店主は元、名店″今川″のオーナー。豚骨出汁と浅蜊を使った塩の清湯は、口当たりが柔らかく、貝の滋養味は繊細で余韻がとても長い。対照に、醤油はカエシをビシッと効かせた力強い一杯。どちらも圧巻の美味しさで、コスパ抜群、接客良し、と隙がない。店名の″柏木″とは、この辺りの旧地名とのこと。ご馳走様でした。

★★★★☆ 3.64pt

▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Visited again, because this shop was temporary closed last time.The owner is ex-manager of the famous ramen shop "Imagawa＠Nokata"（it has closed）.The salt ramen soup which made from pork bones and clams is a subtle flavor and tastes relatively mild, in addition aftertaste is so long.On the contrary, the shoyu one has a deeper and a little intence taste.Both ramens are extremely nice, good value for the price, and customer service is great too, so I can't find a week point. "Kashiwagi " is the old place name near here.Anyway, that was really delicious!Thank you.

Ingredients：broth of pork bones, clams、wheat、pork、bamboo shoot、seasoned boiled egg、green onion

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
先週新宿御苑前にてリニューアルオープン。業界の名手、山本さんのお店。久しぶりの二時間待ちでしたが、凝縮された鯛と蛤出汁に、トリュフオイル、ポルチーニデュクセル、インカベリーソースと、様々な具材が加わり、新鮮でありながら感動の連続。まるで五大シャトーのような複雑さと奥深さを垣間見る一杯。鴨と蛤出汁のつけダレも圧巻で、正直ため息しか出ない。全粒粉の自家製麺も唯一無二で、風味、歯応えも素晴らしい。改めて、ここに名品健在である。

素材：鯛出汁＆貝出汁、鴨出汁＆貝出汁、全粒粉、豚肉、メンマ、パンチェッタ、ポルチーニデュクセル、インカベリーソース、白トリュフオイル、味玉、葱

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

Kamoaburatohamagurinoshiosoba（Shoyu） ￥900
★★★★☆ 3.59pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Reopened after renovating at Shinjukugyoenmae last week.This shop is run by Mr.Yamamoto who is a famous owner on the ramen scene.It took two hours to eat ramens after so long, but these bowls were excellent.Especially the broth of red snapper and hard clams is a rich flavor. In addition, there are some special ingredients, a truffle oil, porcini duxelles, and Inca berry source for changing the taste.These improvements are new but really touchs my heart.It's just like a Bordeaux's Big Five wines because it has a very finer snd subtle taste.The dipping noodle of duck and hard clams is good too, stunned by its taste. Original noodles of whole wheat flour are perfect bite like no other.Realized again the great ramens are still in good even today.

Ingredients：broth of red snapper & hard clams、duck & hard clams、whole wheat flour、pork、bamboo shoot、pancetta、porcini duxelles、Inca berry source、white truffle oil、seasoned boiled egg、green onion

3月にオープンしたGREAT SMILE系列の11店舗目。真骨頂の背脂煮干は本店と変わらず、さっぱりだが濃厚という絶妙なバランス。太縮れ麺の歯応えも丁度良い。やっぱりムタヒロは旨い、麦わら帽子と笑顔が今日もいい。名品健在である。ご馳走様でした。

4日前に九段下にオープンした新店。店主はデジタルクッキングで有名な大和麺学校出身。貝だし塩は蛤全開、鶏醤油は鶏油のコクは厚く、それぞれ別の魅力を持った二杯。麺はシルキーで柔らかさの中に″春よ恋″の風味の良さが光る。次回はぜひ煮干しを食べに来たい。ご馳走様でした。

Newly opened in Kudanshita four days ago.The owner was a graduate of the ramen school ″Yamatomen school″ famous for a digital cooking method. Ordered two bowls, the first one based on  clams is a very finer taste, so excellent hard clam ! The ohter one based chicken broth is rich flavor, anyway each ramens have different attractions. Noodles are really silky, contain the flavor of the famous wheat "Haruyokoi".Next time want to try niboshi ramen.That was really delicious! Thank you.

先月オープンした新橋の二郎系。店主は元新橋二郎の店長。カエシを前面に押し出したスープはキレがあり、キャベツやモヤシも生き生き。麺は二郎の中でもさらに太く、食べ応えは抜群。煮豚も柔らかく、とても美味しい。惜しまれつつ新橋二郎は閉店したが、店主の新橋の人の味方に...という新たな心意気を応援したい。ご馳走様でした。

素材：豚骨＆豚出汁、小麦、豚肉、背脂、キャベツ、モヤシ

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Newly opened in Shinbashi last month.The owner is ex-manager of Ramen Jiro in shinbashi.The soup with storong shoyu sauce（called Kaeshi in Japanese）tastes sharp, so vegetables of topping are good too. Noodles are thicker than other Jiro ramen shops, it's really filling.In addition braised porks are very tender and tasty.Shinbashi Jiro was closed even though it had a lot of lovers, so want to support Mikata owner's spirit for people who use the Shinbashi station. That was really delicious!Thank you.

Ingredients：broth of pork bones and pork、wheat、pork、cabbage、bean sprouts

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
梅雨入り前の曇り空を眺めがら、蒲田の有名店へ。店主は″花田″の出身。ドロリとした動物と野菜出汁の味噌は香り高く、味も濃厚だが、後味はさらり。歯応えも良く、スープにしっかり絡む太麺は三河屋製麺。接客もとても丁寧なのが好印象。ご馳走様でした。

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

Miso ramen ￥790
★★★★☆ 3.53
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Went to a famous ramen shop at Kamata while looking at the dark sky before the rainy season sets in Tokyo.The owner received training at the famous shop ″Hanada″.The broth is made with chicken bones, pork bones and some vegetables.A fermented fragrant and cremy miso soup is excellent, but an aftertaste is not too heavy.Thick noodles from ″Mikawaya Seimen″ are perfect bite, and with the soup well. In addition, the shop staff's hospitality is good too.That was really delicious!Thank you.

Ingredients：broth of chiken bones, pork bones and vegetables、wheat、pork、stir-fried bean sprouts、seasoned boiled egg、bamboo shoots、green onion

Thank you.

4th shop produced by Mr.Tanaka.He is an expert at cooking.
Opened some famous shops（Yuji▶️Odori▶️En▶️and Kasen）in Tokyo.The combination of the robust niboshi（dried sardines）borth like En's one, super smooth pork bones broth, and very thin noodles is a new approach on the ramen scene.Really makes me feel dynamism of cuisine from his original architecture of the Japanese broth.Shop name "Kasen" means "prized delicacies" in English, so no doubt about it.

昆布出汁の光る、無化学調味料の店。突出した新しさはないが、丁寧な調理と優しく滋味深き味わい。特筆は柔らかいチャーシュー。最近は低温調理のチャーシューが多くなり、オーソドックスなのが、たまに食べたくなります。ご馳走様でした。

＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣

★★★★☆ 3.57 pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Labeled no msg (monosodium glutamate), and a broth is made from famous kelps from Rishiri island.No special flavor but this is a detailed cooking, and have a tastiness.The highlight is the tender cut of meat.Recentry a rare pork cooked by heating in a water-bath is very common in Tokyo, so sometimes want to eat an ordinary one.That was really delicious!Thank you.

近くで打合せがあり、久しぶりの八咫烏。相変わらずの手際の良さで、すぐに着丼。盛り付けは美しく、バランスの取れた魚介出汁、熱々の鶏油は健在。麺は博多豚骨の細麺のような食感で、淡麗系では珍しいが、好みの食感である。オリジナリティ溢れる店なので、八咫烏のようにさらなる道の奥へ、進んでほしい。ご馳走様でした。

★★★★☆ 3.59 pt
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Visited "Yatagarasu" for the first time in a while, after a meeting near here.Smoothly served up as usual.The Food presentation is great, a piping hot chicken oil and a balanced dried fish broth are still in good even today.The noodles looks like Hakata Tonkotsu one, but think a tanrei style ramen with very thin straight noodles are not common.Anyway like this perfect bite.Has high originality, so hope that represent a significant break through on the ramen scene, like the "Yatagarasu".That was really delicious!Thank you.

新しいラーメンを求めて新高円寺へ。ハワイで働いていた店主が魅せる、鉄板焼とラーメンのコラボを堪能。彩りや味もさることながら、店のコンセプトも目指すベクトルも斬新の一言。模倣やマンネリも多い業界の中で、より前衛的で新たな取り組みを感じると共に、このクオリティは名店ラーメンのそれである。二杯食べて今夜はお腹一杯、ご馳走様でした。

Visited Shinkoenji for a new style ramen.Shop owner had worked at restaurant in Hawaii before.Enjoyed his cooking combination of Ramen and Teppanyaki（something roasted on a hot plate）.The concepts and future trends are quite novelity,not to mention vivid color presentation and a flavor.Spreading copy and same style ramen on the ramen scene,but strongly feel creative spirits from these.Anyway the quality is amazing,remind me famous shop feeling.I'm stuffed because of 2 bowls.That was really delicious!Thank you.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

Manager received training at famous shop "Menya musashi".This tonkotsu shoyu ramen is made based on Musashi style ramen but feel slightly ″Ramen Shop″（the predecessor of this shop）flavor. This bowl is the one and only. Thick noodles are perfect bite, so I understand the reason why there are a lot of repeaters. That was really delicious ! Thank you.

武蔵小杉で用事を済ませ、大好きなてちに再訪。ここの味噌を食べていると、今は無きくるりのドロ味噌が思い出される...。今日も太麺とやや甘さの残る味噌ダレの絡みは絶品。名品健在である。

今月オープンの新店。サワラの幼魚であるサゴシ煮干しを使った淡麗系と、濃厚な鶏白湯の店（サワラは出世魚で、サゴシ→ナギ→サワラとなる）。出汁の旨味は鰹やアゴより強く、バランスも良いが、カエシがやや強い。ご馳走様でした。

Opened this month.There are two types of ramen,pure shoyu ramen and thick chicken flavor ramen.Both are using  dried young fishes of Sawara（Spanish mackerel）.Sawara is Shusseuo（fish called by different names at different stages of its growth.Called Sagoshi →Nagi→Sawara in Japan）. Broth was richer than bonito or flying fish,but felt soy sause is a little strong.That was really delicious!Thank you.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

160.text:
175°DENO担担麺 GINZa＠銀座 東京都

汁なし担々麺  850円
食べログ ★★★☆☆ 3.27点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
本店は札幌、その支店が銀座にオープン。175℃はラー油を作るときの温度、DENOは創業者の名前。坦々の辛味、ゴマだれのバランスはなかなか、麺のコシがもう少し強いとうれしい。ご馳走さまでした。

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

Hyakunanajugododenotantanmen Ginza@Ginza Tokyo

Shirunashitantanmen ￥850
Taberogu ★★★☆☆ 3.27 points
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Opened in Ginza.Flagship shop is in Sapporo."175℃" of shop name is a temperature to make chili oil.And "DENO" is founder's name.This is Szechuan style sesame Hot Noodles.Sesame flavor and chili numbing of spicy are good match.Had I chosen,hope firm bite.That was really delicious!Thank you.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

161.text:
らぁ麺 はやし田＠新宿三丁目 東京都

特製醤油らぁ麺  1000円
食べログ ★★★★☆ 3.61点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
昨年末オープンの新店。天ぷらの老舗″つな八″の裏。かつて鶏油を使って業界を席巻した、神奈川淡麗系のラーメン。菅野製麺のコシのある細麺と界隈随一のピュア醤油はなかなか。ご馳走さまでした。

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

Ramen Hayashida@Shinjukusanchome in Tokyo

Tokusei shoyu ramen ￥1000
Taberogu ★★★★☆ 3.61 points
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Opened at the end of last year.The back of the famous tempura restaurant ″Tsunahachi″.This ramen is called Kanagawatanrei(※) style.It dominated ramen market in the past.Thin straight noodles made by Suganoseimen are great bite and think it is the best pure shoyu ramen in Shinjuku.That was really delicious!Thank you. ※super pure shoyu ramen using dried fish and chicken oil.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

162.text:
中華そば 田村＠吉成 徳島県

肉入り（バラ肉）小  750円
魚介そば 限定サバ 小 700円
食べログ ★★★★☆ 3.58点
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️感想・コメント
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
美味しそうだったので連食。これまで食べた徳島ラーメンの中では、最もスープのバランスが良く、後味に残る様々な旨味に惹かれ、ファンになりそう。魚介は東京のダブルスープに近いが、こちらも素晴らしく、特にチャーシューは絶品。ご馳走さまでした。

ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーー

Chukasoba tamura@Yoshinari in Tokushima

Nikuiri（baraniku）small size ￥750
Gyokaisoba（mackerel） limited menu ￥700
Taberogu ★★★★☆ 3.58 points
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Had two bowls because they looked good.Best baranced soup of Tokushima style ramen I've ever had.It left me with a great feeling, so gonna be a fan.The second bowl was good too.It looks like Tokyo's double soup（pork and dried fish broth） flavor.Especially,char-siu pork was excellent.That was really delicious!Thank you.
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿

徳島ラーメン 600円

徳島の代表、大道本店。豚骨スープと濃い口醤油のキレ、パツっと噛み応えのある麺は素晴らしく、生卵を混ぜると味わいはさらにマイルドに。これぞ徳島ラーメンの真骨頂。ご馳走さまでした。

Toudai@Awatomida in Tokushima

Tokushima ramen ￥600
Taberogu ★★★★☆ 3.58 points
＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿
▶️Impressions・Comments
￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣
Toudai group are famous ramen chain in Kansai.This is the head shop of them.Pork broth with dark soy sauce and noodle with perfect bite are great much.After that mixed a raw egg, it mellow it out.This is vintage Tokushima ramen, isn't it? That was really delicious!Thank you.

徳島ラーメンの黒の名店。見た目は濃いが、あっさりとした醤油はまさしく支那そば。バラ肉と生卵の相性は素晴らしく、改めて名品健在である。ご馳走さまでした。

Tatsumiya is famous for Tokushima style ramen.Looks like strong flavor but the soup is light, so this is called "shinasoba".Sliced pork belly and a raw egg are good much.Anyway,the great ramen is still in good even today.That was really delicious!Thank you.
